challenge.title: Step 21
challenge.description: Within the filter_expenses_by_category function, replace pass with a lambda function. Use expense as the parameter and return the comparison between the value of the 'category' key of the expense dictionary and category using the equality operator.

tests.text: You should create a lambda function that uses a parameter named expense and returns the expression expense['category'] == category inside the filter_expenses_by_category function.
You should not have pass inside the filter_expenses_by_category function.
